data.title: When We Were Young 2024: Lineup, tickets, how to get to Las Vegas
data.meta_description: Fall Out Boy and My Chemical Romance headline the 2024 When We Were Young lineup at Las Vegas Festival Grounds. Here's the schedule and bag policy.
data.text:
Show Caption

Hide Caption

Phish immerses fans at sold-out Las Vegas Sphere shows

Phish sold out a four-show run at the Las Vegas Sphere.

When We Were Young 2024 music festival returns to the Las Vegas Festival Grounds on Saturday, Oct. 19, 2024, for two days of emo and pop-punk nostalgia with headlining sets by Fall Out Boy and My Chemical Romance performing "The Black Parade" in its entirety.

Mesa's Jimmy Eat World will revisit "Bleed American" in its entirety while Tempe rockers the Maine will dust off "Can't Stop Won't Stop." Both acts played the 2022 edition of the festival, which featured My Chemical Romance and a reunited Paramore topping the bill.

Green Day and Blink-182 headlined When We Were Young in 2023.

When We Were features the same lineup both days with artists performing on four stages — Green, Pink, Ghost and Stripe.

Here’s everything you need to know if you’re going to When We Were Young 2024.

When We Were Young 2024 dates

When We Were Young 2024 is scheduled for Saturday and Sunday, Oct. 19 and 20.

When We Were Young 2024 location

When We Were Young is at the Las Vegas Festival Grounds, an open-air venue at the north end of the Las Vegas Strip.

It’s a 26-acre facility with a capacity of 85,000 people, north of Circus Circus Las Vegas.

The address is 2800 S. Las Vegas Blvd.

Festival grounds are only accessible by walking, rideshare and Las Vegas Monorail. There is no direct access for passenger vehicles.

Parking at When We Were Young

There is no parking at When We Were Young.

When We Were Young 2024 lineup

Here's a full list of the artists scheduled to perform and which albums they'll be playing:

Fall Out Boy: Various albums.

My Chemical Romance: "The Black Parade"

Simple Plan: "No Pads, No Helmets…Just Balls"

We The Kings: "We The Kings"

Story Of The Year" "Page Avenue"

Armor For Sleep: "What to Do When You Are Dead"

Carr

When We Were Young 2024 tickets

Day 1 is sold out.

Day 2 tickets are available at whenwewereyoung.frontgatetickets.com. Here are the prices:

General admission tickets start at $325.

General admission-plus tickets start at $550.

VIP tickets start at $650.

VIP cabana tickets are sold out on both days. You can join a waitlist at whenwewereyoung.frontgatetickets.com. If tickets become available, you will be notified and charged automatically.

How to get to When We Were Young in Las Vegas

Flying to Vegas?

The Las Vegas Festival Grounds are a few miles from Harry Reid International Airport.

Walking to When We Were Young?

If you are staying on The Strip, it’s an easy walk to the festival, with city views along the way.

It's a 15-minute walk from Encore at Wynn Las Vegas.

A 25-minute walk from the Venetian and the Mirage.

A 30-minute walk from Caesars Palace.

Public transportation to When We Were Young

Ride the Las Vegas Monorail to the Sahara Las Vegas Station. Then take the Monorail pedestrian bridge across Paradise Avenue and walk through Sahara before crossing Las Vegas Boulevard to enter the festival grounds.

You can purchase discounts for the Monorail at lvmonorail.com.

If you’re coming from the other side of the Las Vegas Strip, check out the Deuce, a 24-hour bus service that picks up every 15 minutes. Buy a ticket ahead of time on the rideRTC mobile app. You can also pre-purchase your pass at one of the RTC's ticket vending machines at many of their stops. For more information, visit the RTC’s website.

Taxis and limousines

You can get dropped off by a taxi or limousine in the festival’s transportation lot at 810 Circus Circus Drive at the south end of the festival grounds, just across the street from Circus Circus Hotel & Resort. At the end of the night, there will be a taxi queue there.

Rideshare

More information about rideshare pickup and dropoff will be available closer to the date of the festival.

When We Were Young Festival 2024 bag policy

Guests and their belongings are subject to search upon entry. You can help keep the lines moving by leaving large bags at home.

Backpacks, purses and bags must meet the following requirements:

Small clutch purses and fanny packs that are 6 inches by 9 inches or smaller do not need to be clear and can have no more than one pocket.

Bags larger than 6 by 9 inches must be clear and smaller than 12 by 12 by 6 inches.

Hydration packs are allowed and do not need to be clear, but must be empty and have no more than two pockets in addition to the one holding the water reservoir.

Larger iridescent, color-tinted and opalescent bags are not allowed; they must be clear.

Ticket and presale info: Mariah Carey's Christmas tour in Phoenix

What items are prohibited at When We Were Young?

The following items are banned:

Aerosol products/aerosol cans/aerosol sunblock

Air horns or noisemakers

Audio recording devices

AVPs, MODs or liquid to refill cartridges

Bags that don't comply with the bag policy

Bicycles, skates, scooters or skateboards

Blankets and beach towels

Chairs or coolers

Chains or chain wallets

Detachable lens cameras

Drones

Drugs or drug paraphernalia

Fireworks or explosives

Flags

Flyers, samples, giveaways or promotional items

Glass or metal containers

Glow sticks or LED gloves

Hula hoops

Hoverboards or Segways

Instruments

Laser pointers

Mesh bags

Metal, steel or aluminum water bottles

Misters

Outside food or beverages

Pepper spray or mace

Pets or other animals

Selfie sticks or tripods

Sharpies, markers or paint pens

Stuffed Animals or inflatables

Tarps

Totems

Umbrellas or parasols

Unauthorized vendors or solicitors of any kind

Video cameras

Wagons or wagon carts

Walkie talkies

Weapons of any kind

What can I bring into When We Were Young?

The following items are OK to bring:

Baby strollers

Binoculars

Cameras (non-pro)

Chapstick and lip balm (sealed/unopened)

Cigarettes and lighters (one pack of cigarettes per guest)

E-cigs and vape pens

Ear plugs

Eye drops (sealed/unopened)

Feminine hygiene item (sealed/unopened)

GoPros and flip cams

Personal-sized, sealed and unopened hand sanitizer and baby wipes

Hats

Non-aerosol makeup

Over-the-counter medication

Prescription medication in original container with patron's name on bottle and ID to verify; only one type of medication in bottle, which may contain only the appropriate amount of medication necessary while in attendance; prescriptions may not be expired; medications that require refrigeration can be brought to the medical tent for storage)

Misters, cooling towels, liquid IV/electrolyte packets (sealed/unopened), and handheld fans (non-battery operated)

Mobile phones and chargers

Ponchos and rain jackets

Service animals (comfort, therapy and emotional support animals do not meet the definition of a service animal)

Sunblock (non-aerosol)

Sunglasses

Water bottles (empty, plastic, reusable, nonmetal, 32 ounces, one per guest)

Event organizers reserve the right to deny entry to any person or item deemed dangerous.

Security screening at When We Were Young

All patrons are subject to a search prior to entry. By purchasing a ticket, you agree to submit to a full body pat-down and magnetometer screening.

If you would like to be screened by personnel of your same gender, please let security know prior to the search process.

Screening of children will always take place with the consent of a parent or guardian.

Persons who do not comply with the search policy will be refused entry.

When We Were Young reentry policy

More information on the When We Were Young re-entry policy will be available closer to the date of the festival.

Where is the box office at When We Were Young?

More information on the box office location and hours will be available closer to the date of the festival.
